name: Dinosaur Scratch and Paint - Free Game for Kids
name_original: Dinosaur Scratch and Paint - Free Game for Kids
description:
A scratch and color game with amazing dinosaurs!

There are many dino games on the market, but this one is packed with beautiful images drawn by a professional artist. Educational dinosaur games never looked this good before!

In this game children will discover a hidden image in scratch mode or paint in the coloring mode, and also learn the name of each dinosaur as you play.

Key info:
- Recommended age group is preschool kids aged 3-5
- Train hand-eye coordination
- High-resolution graphics, perfect for tablets.

Music: "Earth Prelude" by Kevin Macleod (incompetech)
developers: App Family Kids - Games for boys and girls
